metadata.inclusion:
To add or include the RS-ZWIREX1 into a Z-Wave network using Z-wave Learn mode button
1. Set the controller in inclusion mode
2. Push the Learn mode button once
3. Wait about 15 seconds
metadata.exclusion:
To remove or exclude the RS-ZWIREX1 into a Z-Wave network 
1. Set the controller in exclusion mode 
2. Push Z-Wave Learn mode button once
3. Wait about 5 seconds.
metadata.reset:
The RS-ZWIREX1 can be set to factory settings by pushing Z-wave Learn mode button for 5 seconds. 
Please use this procedure only when the primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
